channel.title: Projects on Kyle Rassweiler's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kyle Rassweiler's Portfolio

item.title: Kawasaki As Parser
item.description: A Kawasaki robot backup parser written in TypeScript for browser or Node. The library also includes TypeScript interfaces for use in new projects.

item.title: Arch Linux i3wm Install Guide
item.description: This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) with Xorg, i3wm, Lightdm, Paru, BTRFS, Snapper, Snap-pac-grub, Snapshots, Qemu, KVM, and Gaming.

item.title: Network Upgrade
item.description: My attempt to replace subscriptions and automate manual media tasks. Services to be replaced: Spotify, Netflix, Amazon Books, Google Drive, Gmail, Google Calendar, Trello, Google Contacts, Zoom.

item.title: Godot First Person Controller (Rigidbody)
item.description: A simple rigidbody based first person controller.

item.title: Raßbräu Hard Seltzer
item.description: Cool crisp hard seltzer brew recipe (Non vodka based) with a choice of flavouring.

item.title: Raßbräu Logo
item.description: A Simple logo for Raßbräu made in inkscape for social media.

item.title: Operation Green Thumbs
item.description:
Updated: 2022-04-22

A 3d printed aeroponics tower design setup as four towers with a central pump.

item.title: Raßbräu Honey Ale
item.description: Cool crisp honey specialty beer, based on the Defalco Honey-Raspberry Ale and the Super Sesh Bros recipe.

item.title: Arch Linux Sway Install Guide
item.description:
Updated: 2022-04-22

This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) with Wayland, Swaywm, Ly desktop launcher, Paru, BTRFS, Subvolumes, Snapper, Snap-pac-grub, Snapshots, Qemu, KVM, Iommu, and Gaming.

item.title: Banana Breeding Bureau
item.description:
A simple web game built using Godot and Blender.

The goal is to plant banana trees and have unit collect dropped bananas in order to ship them to orbit.

item.title: Apple Crumble Recipe
item.description: A delicious and crispy apple crumble recipe, straight from the family pages (Not really).

item.title: KRello
item.description:
A simple clone of the well known kanban system Trello. Currently there isn’t a database attached beyond the react browser, but the user is able to add boards and cards.

There is also drag-n-drop functionality.

item.title: Daily Driver Challenge Hard(er) Mode Part 0
item.description: The Linus Tech Tips Daily Driver Challenge is an attempt at using a linux system as your main rig. The hard(er) mode version is using Arch and i3wm as the os of choice.

item.title: Robot Project Utility
item.description:
A robot project utility written in JS, HTML, CSS, React, and Electron.

The utility helps prepare robot related project work, and view/compare robot backup data.

item.title: KR Display
item.description: A Metor based application for displaying production data from an SQL server.

item.title: Node SCADA System
item.description: As the name implies it is a SCADA system written in js(Node.js), the system uses the mcprotocol to communicate with a Mitsubishi PLC, uses Jade for templates, and express for routing.

item.title: Genetic Algorithm
item.description: A simple genetic algorithm written in modern C++ used to better understand vectors and smart pointers

item.title: 2D Avatar
item.description: A 2d avatar made in inkscape for social media.
